title: What is the process of selective breeding? - Quora

response.answer_text: Selective breeding is a matter of survival. The selector can be the environment or e person who select progeny, chosen for a desired characteristic. The best example that I know of is the different breed of dogs. Cattle are another living thing that are chosen for specific purposes. Agronomy is also based on selective breeding. Now Scientists have gone a huge step further forward using genetic modification of plants. This is a bit alarming to some people Firstly because it was never possible before and secondly it depends on the integrity of the scientist and responsibility of the people who are doing the modifications.
